content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Hassan. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. However, before we proceed, I would like to clarify a few things. May I know the length of your stay in Mannheim and whether you are looking for a long-term or short-term rental? Additionally, do you have any specific requirements or preferences for the apartment, such as location or amenities? This information will help me determine the most suitable rental price for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for a long-term rental. I do not have any specific requirements or preferences. I want the lowest price possible. Can you tell me what the rental price is?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I understand, Hassan. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This price includes all utilities and maintenance costs. Please let me know if this is within your budget and if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month. Thank you for your offer.

I would like to sign the lease agreement as soon as possible. Can you send me the lease agreement and any other necessary documents?

I would also like to know if there are any additional fees or charges that I need to pay before moving in.

Thank you for your help.

Best regards,
Hassan Rahman
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your prompt response, Hassan. I am glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 800 Euros per month. I will immediately send you the lease agreement and any other necessary documents. As for additional fees or charges, there may be a security deposit of one month's rent due upon signing the lease agreement. This deposit will be returned to you at the end of the tenancy period, provided that you fulfill your obligations under the lease agreement. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
